statements.statement: INSERT INTO DEVON.SGMC_TRAN_TB ( TRAN_ID, TRAN_SITE_ID, TRAN_MOD_DT, TRAN_MODUSER_ID, TRAN_REG_DT, TRAN_REGUSER_ID, TRAN_TYPE_CD, TRAN_NM, TRAN_DESC_TX, TRAN_REQCLASS_TX, TRAN_REQMETHOD_TX, TRAN_PRESURCLASS_TX, TRAN_REQSPEC_CD, TRAN_KIND_CD, TRAN_TX_CD, TRAN_TIMEOUT_NO, TRAN_IMAGEINLOG_YN, TRAN_IMAGEOUTLOG_YN, TRAN_SYSLOGLEVEL_CD, TRAN_TRACEOPTION_CD, TRAN_TRACELOGLEVEL_NO, TRAN_VALDFROM_NM, TRAN_VALDTO_NM, TRAN_CTRL_YN, TRAN_ABEND_YN, TRAN_SIMULATION_YN, TRAN_ACCCTRL_YN, TRAN_VALIDATE_YN, TRAN_DUPLICATE_YN, TRAN_CTGR_ID, TRAN_INIOSP_ID, TRAN_OUTIOSP_ID ) values ( ${TRAN_ID}, ${TRAN_SITE_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${TRAN_MODUSER_ID}, ${TRAN_REG_DT}, ${TRAN_REGUSER_ID}, ${TRAN_TYPE_CD}, ${TRAN_NM}, ${TRAN_DESC_TX}, ${TRAN_REQCLASS_TX}, ${TRAN_REQMETHOD_TX}, ${TRAN_PRESURCLASS_TX}, ${TRAN_REQSPEC_CD}, ${TRAN_KIND_CD}, ${TRAN_TX_CD}, ${TRAN_TIMEOUT_NO}, ${TRAN_IMAGEINLOG_YN}, ${TRAN_IMAGEOUTLOG_YN}, ${TRAN_SYSLOGLEVEL_CD}, ${TRAN_TRACEOPTION_CD}, ${TRAN_TRACELOGLEVEL_NO}, ${TRAN_VALDFROM_NM}, ${TRAN_VALDTO_NM}, ${TRAN_CTRL_YN}, ${TRAN_ABEND_YN}, ${TRAN_SIMULATION_YN}, ${TRAN_ACCCTRL_YN}, ${TRAN_VALIDATE_YN}, ${TRAN_DUPLICATE_YN}, ${TRAN_CTGR_ID}, ${TRAN_INIOSP_ID}, ${TRAN_OUTIOSP_ID} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SGRS_TRAN ( REFRESH_ST, SITE_CD, TRAN_ID, TRAN_TYPE_CD, TRAN_CALL_CLASS, TRAN_CALL_METHOD, TRAN_PRESUR_CLASS, TRAN_SPEC_CD, TRAN_KIND_CD, TRAN_TX_CD, TRAN_TIMEOUT_NO, TRAN_IMAGE_INLOG_YN, TRAN_IMAGE_OUTLOG_YN, TRAN_LOG_LEVEL, TRAN_TRACE_OPTION, TRAN_TRACE_LOG_LEVEL, TRAN_VALD_FROMTIME, TRAN_VALD_TOTIME, TRAN_CTRL_YN, TRAN_ABEND_YN, TRAN_SIMULATION_YN, TRAN_BIZ_TYPE, TRAN_INIOSP_ID, TRAN_OUTIOSP_ID, TRAN_ACCCTRL_YN, TRAN_VALIDATE_YN, TRAN_SAVEDTOKEN_YN ) values ( ${REFRESH_ST}, ${SITE_CD}, ${TRAN_ID}, ${TRAN_TYPE_CD}, ${TRAN_CALL_CLASS}, ${TRAN_CALL_METHOD}, ${TRAN_PRESUR_CLASS}, ${TRAN_SPEC_CD}, ${TRAN_KIND_CD}, ${TRAN_TX_CD}, ${TRAN_TIMEOUT_NO}, ${TRAN_IMAGE_INLOG_YN}, ${TRAN_IMAGE_OUTLOG_YN}, ${TRAN_LOG_LEVEL}, ${TRAN_TRACE_OPTION}, ${TRAN_TRACE_LOG_LEVEL}, ${TRAN_VALD_FROMTIME}, ${TRAN_VALD_TOTIME}, ${TRAN_CTRL_YN}, ${TRAN_ABEND_YN}, ${TRAN_SIMULATION_YN}, ${TRAN_BIZ_TYPE}, ${TRAN_INIOSP_ID}, ${TRAN_OUTIOSP_ID}, ${TRAN_ACCCTRL_YN}, ${TRAN_VALIDATE_YN}, ${TRAN_SAVEDTOKEN_YN} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_JOB_INFO_TB ( JOB_ID, JOB_DESC, EXECUTOR_ID, EXEC_ENABLE, COMMIT_COUNT, EXECUTION_TYPE, IS_SIMULTANEOUS, TIMEOUT, JOB_CYCLE, MOD_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID, SITE_CD, SERVER_ID, SHELL_ID, PATH_ID, SIMULTANEOUS_LIMIT_COUNT, TUNING_API_ENABLE, MEMORY_OPTION ) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${JOB_DESC}, ${EXECUTOR_ID}, ${EXEC_ENABLE}, ${COMMIT_COUNT}, ${EXECUTION_TYPE}, ${IS_SIMULTANEOUS}, ${TIMEOUT}, ${JOB_CYCLE}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${MOD_USER_ID}, ${REG_DT}, ${REG_USER_ID}, ${SITE_CD}, ${SERVER_ID}, ${SHELL_ID}, ${PATH_ID}, ${SIMULTANEOUS_LIMIT_COUNT}, ${TUNING_API_ENABLE}, ${MEMORY_OPTION} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_PARAM_INFO_TB ( JOB_ID, PARAM_KEY, PARAM_SEQ, PARAM_VALUE, PARAM_DESC, MOD_DT, REG_USER_ID, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, SEQ, CALE_REF_FLAG, SITE_CD, SYSIN_YN ) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${PARAM_KEY}, ${PARAM_SEQ}, ${PARAM_VALUE}, ${PARAM_DESC}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${REG_USER_ID}, ${REG_DT}, ${MOD_USER_ID}, ${SEQ}, ${CALE_REF_FLAG}, ${SITE_CD}, ${SYSIN_YN} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_STEP_INFO_TB ( JOB_ID, STEP_ID, STEP_DESC, WORKER_CLASS, THREAD_NUM, MAIN_ITEM_TYPE, REG_USER_ID, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DT, SITE_CD, PARALLEL_MODE, REF_JOB_ID, REF_STEP_ID ) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${STEP_ID}, ${STEP_DESC}, ${WORKER_CLASS}, ${THREAD_NUM}, ${MAIN_ITEM_TYPE}, ${REG_USER_ID}, ${REG_DT}, ${MOD_USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${SITE_CD}, ${PARALLEL_MODE}, ${REF_JOB_ID}, ${REF_STEP_ID} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_DB_INFO_TB ( JOB_ID, STEP_ID, DB_SPEC, XML_QUERY_LOC, XML_QUERY_NAME, MAIN_CHECK, MOD_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID, XML_QUERY_ALIAS, SEQ, SITE_CD, INOUT_TYPE ) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${STEP_ID}, ${DB_SPEC}, ${XML_QUERY_LOC}, ${XML_QUERY_NAME}, ${MAIN_CHECK}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${MOD_USER_ID}, ${REG_DT}, ${REG_USER_ID}, ${XML_QUERY_ALIAS}, ${SEQ}, ${SITE_CD}, ${INOUT_TYPE} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_FILE_INFO_TB ( JOB_ID, STEP_ID, FILE_SEQ, INOUT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_PATH, BIZ_FILE_PATH, FILE_ENC, IO_SPEC_ID, FILE_TYPE, FILE_FORM, FILE_CHECK, FILE_ALIAS, MAIN_CHECK, MOD_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_DT, REG_USER_ID, FILE_WORK_PATH, RENAME_FLAG, COMMENTS, CRLF_CHA_CD, FILE_BASE_DIRECTORY, SITE_CD, PRESERVE_CYCLE, IOIT_REC_ENCF1, LINE_END_DELIMITER_YN, FILE_CTGR_ID, EMPTY_FILE_CREAT_YN, NOP_CRYPTO_YN, EBCDIC_CONV_YN, SOSI_OPTION, BACKUP_DIR_PATH, BACKUP_FILENAME
) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${STEP_ID}, ${FILE_SEQ}, ${INOUT_TYPE}, ${FILE_NAME}, ${FILE_PATH}, ${BIZ_FILE_PATH}, ${FILE_ENC}, ${IO_SPEC_ID}, ${FILE_TYPE}, ${FILE_FORM}, ${FILE_CHECK}, ${FILE_ALIAS}, ${MAIN_CHECK}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${MOD_USER_ID}, ${REG_DT}, ${REG_USER_ID}, ${FILE_WORK_PATH}, ${RENAME_FLAG}, ${COMMENTS}, ${CRLF_CHA_CD}, ${FILE_BASE_DIRECTORY}, ${SITE_CD}, ${PRESERVE_CYCLE}, ${IOIT_REC_ENCF1}, ${LINE_END_DELIMITER_YN}, ${FILE_CTGR_ID}, ${EMPTY_FILE_CREAT_YN}, ${NOP_CRYPTO_YN}, ${EBCDIC_CONV_YN}, ${SOSI_OPTION}, ${BACKUP_DIR_PATH}, ${BACKUP_FILENAME} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_STEP_DEPEND_ONS_TB ( JOB_ID, STEP_ID, DEPEND_ONS_STEP_ID, REG_USER_ID, REG_DT, MOD_USER_ID, MOD_DT, SITE_CD ) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${STEP_ID}, ${DEPEND_ONS_STEP_ID}, ${REG_USER_ID}, ${REG_DT}, ${MOD_USER_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${SITE_CD} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SERE_BT_ONDEMAND_INFO_TB ( JOB_ID, EXEC_ENABLE_START_TIME, EXEC_ENABLE_END_TIME, EXEC_ENABLE_YN, EXEC_ENABLE_WEEK_DAYS, EXIT_RESPONSE_CHN, REG_DT, MOD_DT, MOD_USER_ID, REG_USER_ID, SITE_CD ) values ( ${JOB_ID}, ${EXEC_ENABLE_START_TIME}, ${EXEC_ENABLE_END_TIME}, ${EXEC_ENABLE_YN}, ${EXEC_ENABLE_WEEK_DAYS}, ${EXIT_RESPONSE_CHN}, ${REG_DT}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${MOD_USER_ID}, ${REG_USER_ID}, ${SITE_CD} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SGMC_IOSPEC_TB ( IOSP_ID, IOSP_SITE_ID, IOSP_MOD_DT, IOSP_MODUSER_ID, IOSP_REG_DT, IOSP_REGUSER_ID, IOSP_RESCGROUP_ID, IOSP_IDEPACKAGE_NM, IOSP_TY, IOSP_INCLUDE_YN, IOSP_DESC_TX, IOSP_CHKOUT_YN, IOSP_CHKOUT_DT, IOSP_CHKOUTUSER_ID, IOSP_CHNGUSER_ID, IOSP_CHNG_DT, IOSP_VERSION_NO, IOSP_CTGR_ID ) values ( ${IOSP_ID}, ${IOSP_SITE_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${IOSP_MODUSER_ID}, ${IOSP_REG_DT}, ${IOSP_REGUSER_ID}, ${IOSP_RESCGROUP_ID}, ${IOSP_IDEPACKAGE_NM}, ${IOSP_TY}, ${IOSP_INCLUDE_YN}, ${IOSP_DESC_TX}, ${IOSP_CHKOUT_YN}, ${IOSP_CHKOUT_DT}, ${IOSP_CHKOUTUSER_ID}, ${IOSP_CHNGUSER_ID}, ${IOSP_CHNG_DT}, ${IOSP_VERSION_NO}, ${IOSP_CTGR_ID} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SGMC_IOITEM_TB ( IOIT_ID, IOIT_SITE_ID, IOIT_MOD_DT, IOIT_MODUSER_ID, IOIT_REG_DT, IOIT_REGUSER_ID, IOIT_SQ, IOIT_IOSP_ID, IOIT_DATA_TY, IOIT_PARENTPATH_ID, IOIT_LENGTH_NO, IOIT_MANDATORY_YN, IOIT_DEFAULTVAL_NM, IOIT_DECIMAL_NO, IOIT_DESC_TX, IOIT_HANGUL_YN, IOIT_POINT_YN, IOIT_VERSION_NO, IOIT_TYPE_CD, IOIT_SORT_CD, IOIT_REMARK_YN, IOIT_SCALE_NO, IOIT_FILLER_TX, IOIT_VALIDATE_NM, IOIT_BT_FLD_TP_CD, IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_CD, IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_YN, IOIT_BT_FLD_VAL_CD, IOIT_ORDER_NO, IOIT_CRYPTO_YN, IOIT_CRYPTO_ALG, IOIT_IDENTIF_YN, IOIT_ENCTP, IOIT_ENCF1, IOIT_ENCF2, IOIT_ENCF3, IOIT_ENCF4, IOIT_REC_ENCF1, SIGN_BIT_YN, SIGN_BIT_POS, TRIM_YN, TRIM_TY, NON_ENC_CN_FM, WN_CHAR_OPTION ) values ( ${IOIT_ID}, ${IOIT_SITE_ID}, TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISSFF3'), ${IOIT_MODUSER_ID}, ${IOIT_REG_DT}, ${IOIT_REGUSER_ID}, ${IOIT_SQ}, ${IOIT_IOSP_ID}, ${IOIT_DATA_TY}, ${IOIT_PARENTPATH_ID}, ${IOIT_LENGTH_NO}, ${IOIT_MANDATORY_YN}, ${IOIT_DEFAULTVAL_NM}, ${IOIT_DECIMAL_NO}, ${IOIT_DESC_TX}, ${IOIT_HANGUL_YN}, ${IOIT_POINT_YN}, ${IOIT_VERSION_NO}, ${IOIT_TYPE_CD}, ${IOIT_SORT_CD}, ${IOIT_REMARK_YN}, ${IOIT_SCALE_NO}, ${IOIT_FILLER_TX}, ${IOIT_VALIDATE_NM}, ${IOIT_BT_FLD_TP_CD}, ${IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_CD}, ${IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_YN}, ${IOIT_BT_FLD_VAL_CD}, ${IOIT_ORDER_NO}, ${IOIT_CRYPTO_YN}, ${IOIT_CRYPTO_ALG}, ${IOIT_IDENTIF_YN}, ${IOIT_ENCTP}, ${IOIT_ENCF1}, ${IOIT_ENCF2}, ${IOIT_ENCF3}, ${IOIT_ENCF4}, ${IOIT_REC_ENCF1}, ${SIGN_BIT_YN}, ${SIGN_BIT_POS}, ${TRIM_YN}, ${TRIM_TY}, ${NON_ENC_CN_FM}, ${WN_CHAR_OPTION} )

INSERT INTO DEVON.SGRS_IOSPECITEM ( REFRESH_ST, SITE_CD, SPEC_ID, IOIT_INCLUDE_YN, ITEM_ID, IOIT_SQ, IOIT_DATA_TY, IOIT_PARENTPATH_ID, IOIT_LENGTH_NO, IOIT_MANDATORY_YN, IOIT_DEFAULTVAL_NM, IOIT_DECIMAL_NO, IOIT_DESC_TX, IOIT_POINT_YN, IOIT_VERSION_NO, IOIT_TYPE_CD, IOIT_REMARK_YN, IOIT_SORT_CD, IOIT_SCALE_NO, IOIT_FILLER_TX, IOIT_VALIDATE_NM, IOIT_BT_FLD_TP_CD, IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_CD, IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_YN, IOIT_BT_FLD_VAL_CD, IOIT_CRYPTO_YN, IOIT_CRYPTO_ALG, IOIT_IDENTIF_YN, IOIT_ENCTP, IOIT_ENCF1, IOIT_ENCF2, IOIT_ENCF3, IOIT_ENCF4, IOIT_REC_ENCF1, SIGN_BIT_YN, SIGN_BIT_POS, TRIM_YN, TRIM_TY, NON_ENC_CN_FM, WN_CHAR_OPTION ) values ( ${REFRESH_ST}, ${SITE_CD}, ${SPEC_ID}, ${IOIT_INCLUDE_YN}, ${ITEM_ID}, ${IOIT_SQ}, ${IOIT_DATA_TY}, ${IOIT_PARENTPATH_ID}, ${IOIT_LENGTH_NO}, ${IOIT_MANDATORY_YN}, ${IOIT_DEFAULTVAL_NM}, ${IOIT_DECIMAL_NO}, ${IOIT_DESC_TX}, ${IOIT_POINT_YN}, ${IOIT_VERSION_NO}, ${IOIT_TYPE_CD}, ${IOIT_REMARK_YN}, ${IOIT_SORT_CD}, ${IOIT_SCALE_NO}, ${IOIT_FILLER_TX}, ${IOIT_VALIDATE_NM}, ${IOIT_BT_FLD_TP_CD}, ${IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_CD}, ${IOIT_BT_CHK_FLD_YN}, ${IOIT_BT_FLD_VAL_CD}, ${IOIT_CRYPTO_YN}, ${IOIT_CRYPTO_ALG}, ${IOIT_IDENTIF_YN}, ${IOIT_ENCTP}, ${IOIT_ENCF1}, ${IOIT_ENCF2}, ${IOIT_ENCF3}, ${IOIT_ENCF4}, ${IOIT_REC_ENCF1}, ${SIGN_BIT_YN}, ${SIGN_BIT_POS}, ${TRIM_YN}, ${TRIM_TY}, ${NON_ENC_CN_FM}, ${WN_CHAR_OPTION} )
